title: Youth workers tapes
creator_credit: Andrew Scollo and Australia Open Chanel
brief_description: A series of six segments designed to estimulate discussion on various issues related to youth work. Four of the episodes contain dramatized situations depicting the difficulties faced by young people. Two of the episodes concentrate on the views of the youth workers in the field and youths who have been wards of he state.
